title: WATCH: Illarramendi's thunderbolt!
text:
WATCH: Asier Illarramendi hits stunning winner as Real Sociedad win 2-1 at Espanyol   11:01pm Watch Asier Illarramendi's sensational winning goal for Real Sociedad at Espanyol Asier Illarramendi hit an absolute screamer on Friday night to secure Real Sociedad a 2-1 La Liga victory away at Espanyol . 
Carlos Vela opened the scoring for the visitors in the 26th minute, controlling a fine pass from David Zurutuza and neatly slotting a left-footed finish past Diego Lopez. 
The lead was short-lived, however, with Hernan Perez cutting inside to evade defenders Yuri Berchiche and Inigo Martinez before coolly side-footing home. 
But Illarramendi restored Sociedad's advantage just after the hour mark with a brilliant solo goal, picking up possession level with the centre-circle before advancing and unleashing a wonderful curling effort to find the top corner. Asier Illarramendi (R) scores Real Sociedad's winner 
And the superb goal from the former Real Madrid midfielder proved to be the winner as Sociedad moved into fourth place in La Liga at the expense of Atletico Madrid. 
Diego Simeone's side have the chance to respond on Sunday evening when they take on Celta Vigo, live on Sky Sports 1 and Sky Sports Mix . 
Watch Asier Illarramendi's thunderbolt by hitting play on the video at the top of the page! Sociedad vs Villarreal
